TH34.name: TH-34
TH34.description:
<c=aaaaaa>TH-34</c>
A common warehouse workbot reprogrammed for combat. Can switch between a <c=keyword>battle form</c> that generates <c=downside>heat</c>, and a <c=keyword>defense form</c> that removes it.

SilverCoils.name: SILVER COILS
SilverCoils.description: The first time you <c=downside>overheat</c> each combat, <c=heal>heal 1</c> and gain 1 <c=status>HEAT CAPACITY</c>.

CodeBlue.name: CODE BLUE
CodeBlue.description: Draw <c=action>+1 card</c> every turn if you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>.

ElectronDonor.name: ELECTRON DONOR
ElectronDonor.description:
If you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c> and less than 
-2 <c=status>HEAT</c>, attacks deal +1 damage.

MechanicalHeart.name: MECHANICAL HEART
MechanicalHeart.description: Whenever you gain <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c> or <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>, gain 1 more.

IonBattery.name: ION BATTERY
IonBattery.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> the first time you gain <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c> or <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c> every turn.

PlusCharge.name: PLUS CHARGE
PlusCharge.description: Attacks do <c=keyword>{0}</c> more damage. Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>HEAT</c> after every attack.

MinusCharge.name: MINUS CHARGE
MinusCharge.description: Attacks do <c=keyword>{0}</c> less damage. Lose <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>HEAT</c> after every card played. <c=status>HEAT</c> can be reduced to -3.

Optimize.name: OPTIMIZE
Optimize.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if you have any <c=status>MINUS CHARGE</c>.

OptimizeB.name: OPTIMIZE B
OptimizeB.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn if you have any <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>.
